mapper.sql: t.id, t.order_id, t.goods_id, t.goods_num, t.goods_price, t.add_time, t.update_time
mapper.delete: delete from goods_order_item where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_order_item ( order_id, goods_id, goods_num, goods_price, add_time, update_time ) values( #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update goods_order_item set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
